transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji. Hello. Sir sorry wo call disconnect ho gaya tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji. To sir main Anurag ko wo feedback maine note down kar liya hai 15 din ka call ka aur wo jo offer wala aap bata rahe the sir ki jaise 10 diamond mein aapko milta hai option hai na karke to
Customer: Aur kisi bhi apps mein milta hai apne ko stock ending sale jaise ki mere ko jo stock pada hai usko nikalna hai. To main us pe best offer rakh sakta kuch bhi kar sakta hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To uske liye kya option hai mere paas?
Executive: Sir hamare paas sirf dekhiye sir aise koi additionally customization cheez nahi hai ye. Ye template catalog hai sir isme sirf product display kar sakte hain aap. Aap matlab customization nahi kar sakte kuch bhi isme.
Customer: Theek hai madam utna hi mere ko. Yahi haan ji haan ji baki sir aapke do product hai jinki aap buylead consume kar rahe ho aur wo added nahi hai catalog mein. To kya aap chahenge unko add karna jaise sir single phase motor hai ya fir three phase motor hai aapka?
Customer: Madam market mein bahut log samajhdar hai wo ek ek cheez mere ko add karne ki waha pe jarurat hi nahi hai. Induction motor dal diya matlab sabko pata hai ki motor related kitna bhi hoga wo koi bhi company ho koi bhi brand ho sabhi quality mere paas milega.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur single phase aur three phase mein motor ka photo dekh ke to aap define nahi kar sakte ki ye single phase hai aur ye three phase hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir jaise ki log sir electric motor bhi hai ya fir aapne jaise abhi induction motor. Wahi bol raha hu na madam aap induction motor boliye electrical motor boliye single phase boliye three phase boliye sab wo types of motor hi hai aur mera dealing hi motor pe hai wo koi bhi type of mein motor dunga hi. To fir usko sab category mein ja ke add karne ka koi matlab hi nahi nikalta hai.
Executive: Ji matlab aap induction motors ko add nahi karana chahte sir aap ye bol rahe hain?
Executive: Kyunki wo added nahi hai sir main isliye puch rahi hu aap se. Aapne aapne apni main category wahi bataiye aur wahi matlab added nahi hai sir isme to agar aap kehte hain to main usko add kar deti hu aur agar aap nahi mana karenge sir to wo as it is bhi rakh sakte hain koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi aap usko add kar dijiye bas usme jo maine picture ya jo share kiya hai same picture aayega uska koi alag se photo nahi aata hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To matlab picture same use ho sakti hai sir dekho matlab wahi cheez hai. Sir agar picture same bhi use karna chahte hain to usse koi dikkat nahi hai but sir agar aap different matlab product mapping ya products ko rakhoge to usse inquiry bhi usi hisab se generate hongi. Samajh rahe hain aap main haan to main wo add kara du sir agar aapko koi issue nahi hai to.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji. Chalo.
Executive: Nahi aap add kara dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir main ye add karwa deti hu. Baki koi aur aapka feedback rahe kuch bhi rahe aap is number pe mujhe call kar lijiyega and sir wo jo Anurag ki call ke baad matlab ek call request ka matlab ek feedback hamare paas issue ho jata hai. To uska ek closer sir aapke paas jayega please aap usko sir yes satisfied mark kar dijiyega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay okay sir thank you so much sir thank you.
Customer: Aage sir bol.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants stock ending sale option like other apps.

- Wants to add induction motors to catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about template catalog.

- Agreed to add induction motors with same picture.

- Executive requested to mark feedback as satisfied.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will add induction motors to catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, induction motor, feedback, customization
